text:
ezCater.com - BOSTON, MA - Senior Ruby on Rails Developer

We're an Airbnb/Expedia-style marketplace for catering.

We're a fully funded start-up (Series A), growing fast. Looking for an experienced RoR hacker. Rails 3.2, jQuery, Bootstrap, etc. Full salary + equity. Located in downtown Boston (just off Boston Common).

This is a chance to really make a difference. You'll be the first developer hired, post Series A. Email us at hackers@ezcater.com.
